entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,466Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 435

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: Response from HR
entry.summary:
Author: SimplyAnotherWriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,029Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 1,764

Summary: Marinette only agreed to work at WE because Jagged and Penny insisted that it would be okay. They reassured her that they had scouted the company out just as thoroughly as she had taught them to, and so there shouldn't be any problems.And there wasn't! At least...Not until her Boss and his family decided to keep hovering over her 24/7, with one son acting like an overprotective brother, and another son constantly showing up and clinging to her(he had no right to have such a pretty face!!!).o0oOo0oPART 2! entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 108,652Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 8,848

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.

entry.title: The Right Wrong Place In The Right Wrong Time
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,278Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 516

Summary: Soulmates are rare. Everyone has one, but *meeting* your soulmate is rare. In order to meet your soulmate, you need to shift. In order to shift, you need to be perfectly in sync with your soulmate. Your hearts need to beat in sync, your movements need to be in sync, perfectly mirroring one another. A blink, a *twitch* could be the difference between meeting your soulmate and not.Damian's soulmate shifts to him at the most awkward time possible.

entry.title: The last thing she lost
entry.summary:
Author: Ppm

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,074Chapters: 16/27Kudos: 1,226

Summary: Having a "lost and found" soulmate was annoying to Damian. He never knew what to do with the 27 of the same pink color pencils she somehow kept losing or when the next needle would prick him. But after spending years and years with her as a soulmate, he somehow grew to accept her as she was.So when Damian found two mysterious boxes one night, he didn't care too much about them.Never once had he thought that it would be magical artifacts.He also never once thought it would be the last thing she lost before she died.

entry.title: New chances
entry.summary:
Author: Legomi

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,195Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 102

Summary: Marinette is tired, after years of fighting she is no nearer to defeating Hawmoth, add to that the arrival of an apparent mythomaniac obsessed with ruining her civilian life and we can say that the fact that she hasn't attracted any butterflies yet was a miraculous thing in itself, but if things keep going the way they are going, that won't last for much longer.It is after a particularly shocking incident that she comes to the realization that staying in Paris is too dangerous, leading her to make the choice to seek a new place to live, and Gotham City seemed to be the right place for her.

entry.title: The Girl from Paris
entry.summary:
Author: FelicisMagic18873

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,668Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 1,630

Summary: For a second, just a single second, Marinette imagined doing nothing.Imagined standing there with the rest of the class and just watching as blood splattered on the floor, secure in the knowledge that no one could blame her for not stepping in.After all, it wasn't Paris. She wasn't Ladybug, and Lila had been picked randomly from their group to be held at gunpoint.
